column4: hello im new to compiling. im at the "make" stage for Xlt (something  i need to tether my blackberry) but i get "returned error 1" and "returned error 2" whats going on and how do i debug?
Look for a compiler error above the "error 1"
i think i figured it out. thanks
Most often, you are missing a dependeny. You can install all build dependecies using apt build-dep
